title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 99 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 99 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.
lineList.cn: 耶和华作王，万民当战抖。他坐在二基路伯上，地当动摇。

lineList.en: The LORD is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.
lineList.cn: 耶和华在锡安为大。他超乎万民之上。

lineList.en: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.
lineList.cn: 他们当称赞他大而可畏的名。他本为圣。

lineList.en: The king's strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
lineList.cn: 王有能力喜爱公平，竖立公正，在雅各中施行公平和公义。

lineList.en: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
lineList.cn: 你们当尊崇耶和华我们的神，在他脚凳前下拜。他本为圣。

lineList.en: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
lineList.cn: 在他的祭司中有摩西和亚伦，在求告他名的人中有撒母耳，他们求告耶和华，他就应允他们。

lineList.en: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.
lineList.cn: 他在云柱中对他们说话。他们遵守他的法度，和他所赐给他们的律例。

lineList.en: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
lineList.cn: 耶和华我们的神阿，你应允他们。你是赦免他们的神，却按他们所行的报应他们。

lineList.en: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
lineList.cn: 你们要尊崇耶和华我们的神，在他的圣山下拜。因为耶和华我们的神本为圣。
